name: Screenbeard
message: I've added you manually so you can use your wave account. I've embedded a facsimile of a wave into this post so people who haven't got Wave can see kinda how it works. They hit "reply" and leave a message - but it leaves the message as me. It uses a bot called Mr-Ray. Of course anyone without a wave account misses all the other cool features that Wave has, but it's a reasonable way to introduce people who've never used it.
